metadata.description:
The ghost of a rose,
A fading bloom,
Covered in thorns,
Don’t touch too soon,

I walked to the park,
Where we buried our hearts,
They still beat, though they’re covered in moss,
In the quiet dusk when only robins tweet,

A melting frost,
A dull thud like an echo,
The grass itself beats,
The pulse we call home.

Based on the original oil paintings by Adam Disbrow ~ @adam_disbrow
AI Animation and Music by Laurence Fuller ~ @laurencefuller
Poetry and Performances by Laurence Fuller ~ @laurencefuller
www.laurencefuller.art/web3
metadata.name: Ghost Of A Rose I #1/1
